p: Blood transfusion represents a high-risk factor in contracting HEV in China. Chinese blood donors were 32.60% anti-HEV IgG seropositive and HEV viremia was 0.07% [ 81]. In the Philippines, 85 blood bags were assessed for the existence of HEV IgG and IgM antibodies; the prevalence of acute HEV infection using the IgM anti-HEV was 2.4% [ 82]. In Japan, 7.1% of a large cohort of blood donors (6700 individuals), with high liver alanine aminotransferase (ALT), tested positive for anti-HEV IgG [ 83].
